#
# Autogenerated from /export/home/dicuccio/cpp-cmake/cpp-cmake.2015-01-24/src/ctools/Makefile.ctools.lib

add_library(xctools
    ctools asn_connection
)
include_directories(SYSTEM ${NCBI_C_INCLUDE})

target_link_libraries(xctools
    ${NCBI_C_LIBPATH} ${NCBI_C_ncbi} connect xncbi
)

if (APPLE)
   target_link_libraries(xctools
    ${NCBI_C_LIBPATH} ${NCBI_C_ncbi} connect xncbi
)
endif (APPLE)
